category.description: Foodstuffs (including beverages but excluding alcoholic beverages) for human and animal consumption; live animals, seeds, plants and ingredients normally intended for use in the preparation of foodstuffs; products normally used to supplement foodstuffs or as a substitute for foodstuffs

vatRateResults.comment: Edible oils and fats of vegetable or animal origin, baby foods and processed cereal-based foods for infants and young children and food for animals other than pet food, live animals, fresh or chilled meat and edible offal, fresh or chilled fish, molluscs or other aquatic invertebrates, fresh or chilled crustaceans, fresh or chilled crustaceans, fresh and dried fruits and nuts, fresh or chilled vegetables, roots and tubers, including dried leguminous vegetables, fresh poultry eggs in shell.

code.description: Milk and cream, not concentrated nor containing added sugar or other sweetening matter
Not containing added sugar or other sweetening matter
Containing by weight less than 30 % of sucrose (including invert sugar expressed as sucrose)
Rusks, toasted bread and similar toasted products
Bread, not containing added honey, eggs, cheese or fruit, and containing by weight in the dry matter state not more than 5 % of sugars and not more than 5 % of fat
Containing 5 % or more, by weight, of sucrose, invert sugar or isoglucose

category.description: Foodstuffs (including beverages but excluding alcoholic beverages) for human and animal consumption; live animals, seeds, plants and ingredients normally intended for use in the preparation of foodstuffs; products normally used to supplement foodstuffs or as a substitute for foodstuffs

vatRateResults.comment:
Reduced rate applies to all types of bread,
and all types of milk (cow, sheep, goat) placed on the market under the same name in the liquid state, fresh, pasteurized, homogenized, condensed (other than sour milk, yoghurt, kefir, chocolate milk and other milk products), substitute for mother’s milk.

code.description: Preparations containing cocoa for making beverages
Preparations suitable for infants or young children, put up for retail sale
Mixes and doughs for the preparation of bakers' wares of heading 1905

Containing no milkfats, sucrose, isoglucose, glucose or starch or containing less than 1,5 % milkfat, 5 % sucrose (including invert sugar) or isoglucose, 5 % glucose or starch, excluding food preparations in powder form of goods of headings 0401 to 0404
Containing no milkfats, sucrose, isoglucose, glucose or starch or containing, by weight, less than 1,5 % milkfat, 5 % sucrose or isoglucose, 5 % glucose or starch
Colloidal precious metals; inorganic or organic compounds of precious metals, whether or not chemically defined; amalgams of precious metals
Inorganic or organic compounds of mercury, whether or not chemically defined, excluding amalgams
Immunological products, put up in measured doses or in forms or packings for retail sale
Animal blood prepared for therapeutic, prophylactic or diagnostic uses

Medicaments (excluding goods of heading 3002, 3005 or 3006) consisting of mixed or unmixed products for therapeutic or prophylactic uses, put up in measured doses (including those in the form of transdermal administration systems) or in forms or packings for retail sale

Wadding, gauze, bandages and similar articles (for example, dressings, adhesive plasters, poultices), impregnated or coated with pharmaceutical substances or put up in forms or packings for retail sale for medical, surgical, dental or veterinary purposes
Opacifying preparations for X-ray examinations; diagnostic reagents designed to be administered to the patient
Chemical contraceptive preparations based on hormones, on other products of heading 2937 or on spermicides

Gel preparations designed to be used in human or veterinary medicine as a lubricant for parts of the body for surgical operations or physical examinations or as a coupling agent between the body and medical instruments
Nicotine patches (transdermal systems), intended to assist smokers to stop smoking

category.description: Pharmaceutical products of a kind normally used for health care, prevention of illness and as treatment for medical and veterinary purposes, including products used for contraception and sanitary protection

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to medicines which have the approval of the competent authority for medicines and medical products.

code.description: Wadding, gauze, bandages and similar articles (for example, dressings, adhesive plasters, poultices), impregnated or coated with pharmaceutical substances or put up in forms or packings for retail sale for medical, surgical, dental or veterinary purposes

Sterile surgical catgut, similar sterile suture materials (including sterile absorbable surgical or dental yarns) and sterile tissue adhesives for surgical wound closure; sterile laminaria and sterile laminaria tents; sterile absorbable surgical or dental haemostatics; sterile surgical or dental adhesion barriers, whether or not absorbable
Dental cements and other dental fillings; bone reconstruction cements

Gel preparations designed to be used in human or veterinary medicine as a lubricant for parts of the body for surgical operations or physical examinations or as a coupling agent between the body and medical instruments
Products suitable for use as glues or adhesives, put up for retail sale as glues or adhesives, not exceeding a net weight of 1 kg
Diagnostic or laboratory reagents on a backing, prepared diagnostic or laboratory reagents whether or not on a backing, other than those of heading 3002 or 3006; certified reference materials
Other, not reinforced or otherwise combined with other materials, with fittings
Articles of apparel and clothing accessories (including gloves, mittens and mitts)
Hygienic or pharmaceutical articles (including teats), of vulcanised rubber other than hard rubber, with or without fittings of hard rubber
Graduated compression hosiery (for example, stockings for varicose veins)
Walking sticks, seat-sticks, whips, riding-crops and the like

Nails, tacks, drawing pins, corrugated nails, staples (other than those of heading 8305) and similar articles, of iron or steel, whether or not with heads of other material, but excluding such articles with heads of copper
Machines which perform two or more of the functions of printing, copying or facsimile transmission, capable of connecting to an automatic data-processing machine or to a network
Machines for the reception, conversion and transmission or regeneration of voice, images or other data, including switching and routing apparatus
Using magnetic, optical or semiconductor media
Carriages for disabled persons, whether or not motorised or otherwise mechanically propelled
Renal dialysis equipment (artificial kidneys, kidney machines and dialysers)

Mechano-therapy appliances; massage apparatus; psychological aptitude-testing apparatus; ozone therapy, oxygen therapy, aerosol therapy, artificial respiration or other therapeutic respiration apparatus

Orthopaedic appliances, including crutches, surgical belts and trusses; splints and other fracture appliances; artificial parts of the body; hearing aids and other appliances which are worn or carried, or implanted in the body, to compensate for a defect or disability
Parts and accessories (not specified or included elsewhere in this chapter) for machines, appliances, instruments or apparatus of Chapter 90
Wristwatches, pocket-watches and other watches, including stopwatches, other than those of heading 9101
Napkins and napkin liners and similar articles
Napkins and napkin liners for babies

category.description: Medical equipment, aids and other appliances normally intended to alleviate or treat disability, for the exclusive personal use of the disabled, including the repair of such goods

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to medical equipment, aids and other appliances normally intended to alleviate or treat disability, for the exclusive personal use of the disabled people, prescribed by an act of general application on orthopaedic and other aids.

code.description: Newspapers, journals and periodicals, whether or not illustrated or containing advertising material

category.description: Newspapers

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to newspaper of the newspaper publisher which has the status of a medium, published daily, other than those that contain, in whole or for the most part, advertisements or serve for advertising, and other than those that contain, in whole or for the most part, video recording or music content.

code.description: Newspapers, journals and periodicals, whether or not illustrated or containing advertising material

category.description: Periodicals

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to scientific periodicals

code.description: Printed books, brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, whether or not in single sheets
Children's picture, drawing or colouring books
Music, printed or in manuscript, whether or not bound or illustrated
Maps and hydrographic or similar charts of all kinds, including atlases, wall maps, topographical plans and globes, printed
Antiques of an age exceeding 100 years

category.description: Supply, including on loan by libraries, of books, newspapers and periodicals either on physical means of support or supplied electronically or both (including brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, children's picture, drawing or colouring books, music printed or in manuscript form, maps and hydrographic or similar charts), other than publications wholly or predominantly devoted to advertising and other than publications wholly or predominantly consisting of video content or audible music.

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to books of professional, scientific, artistic, cultural or educational content, textbooks for education, for primary, secondary and tertiary education, other than those that contain, in whole or for the most part, advertisements or serve for advertising, and other than those that contain, in whole or for the most part, video recording or music content.

category.description: Admission to shows, theatres, circuses, fairs, amusement parks, concerts, museums, zoos, cinemas, exhibitions and similar cultural events and facilities

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to tickets for cinema, tickets for concerts and cultural events.

category.description: Admission to sporting events

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to tickets for sporting events of a competitive or revival character.

category.description: Supply of district heating

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to supply of heating from heating stations, including charges relating to such supplies made until March 31, 2026.

category.description: Supply of water

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to supply of water, other than water marketed in bottles or other packaging, in terms of public water supply and public drainage under special regulation.

category.description: Supply of electricity

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to supply of electricity towards other supplier or end-user, including fees related to the supply.

category.description: Supply of services by undertakers and cremation services, and the supply of goods related thereto

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to supplies of urns and coffins

code.description: Newspapers, journals and periodicals, whether or not illustrated or containing advertising material

category.description: Newspapers

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to newspapers and periodicals of a newspaper publisher with the status of a medium, as well as those for which there is no obligation to issue the medium status under special regulation, other than those referred to in paragraph 2 item g) of Article 38, issued periodically and other than those that contain, in whole or for the most part, advertisements or serve for advertising, and other than those that contain, in whole or for the most part, video recording or music content.

code.description: Napkins and napkin liners and similar articles
Napkins and napkin liners for babies

category.description: Supply of children’s car seats

vatRateResults.comment:
Applies to car seats for children. 
Reduced rate of 13% applies also on baby diapers.

category.description: Accommodation provided in hotels and similar establishments, including the provision of holiday accommodation and the letting of places on camping or caravan sites

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to accommodation services or accommodation with breakfast, half board or full board in hotels and similar facilities, including holiday accommodation, rental of premises in recreation camps or in places designated for camping and accommodation in nautical tourism facilities on water.

category.description: Supply of services by writers, composers and performing artists, or of the royalties due to them

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to services and related copyright of writers, composers and performing artists who are members of relevant organisations for collective exercising of rights and supplying those services under special regulations in the field of copyright and related rights with prior authorisation of government authority competent for intellectual property.

category.description: Supply of services provided in connection with street cleaning, refuse collection and waste treatment, other than the supply of such services by bodies referred to in Article 13

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to public service of collecting mixed communal waste, biodegradable communal waste and separate waste collection according to a special regulation

category.description: Restaurant and catering services, it being possible to exclude the supply of (alcoholic and/or non-alcoholic) beverages

vatRateResults.comment: Preparation and serving of food and desserts in and outside of catering facilities in accordance with special regulation.

category.description: Pharmaceutical products of a kind normally used for health care, prevention of illness and as treatment for medical and veterinary purposes, including products used for contraception and sanitary protection

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to menstrual products: sanitary pads, daily pads, tampons, menstrual cups, menstrual panties, menstrual sponge, menstrual disc, etc., which are used specifically during menstruation, regardless of whether they are intended for single or multiple use.

code.description: Insecticides, rodenticides, fungicides, herbicides, anti-sprouting products and plant-growth regulators, disinfectants and similar products, put up in forms or packings for retail sale or as preparations or articles (for example, sulphur-treated bands, wicks and candles, and fly-papers)

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment:
Pesticides and other agrochemical products are insecticides, rodenticides, fungicides, herbicides, anti-germination agents, plant growth regulators, disinfectants and similar products, put up in forms or packings for individual sale or as preparations or articles of CN 3808.
Residues and waste from the food industry and prepared animal food from Ch. 23 excluding greaves CN 2301 10, wine lees and tartar CN 2307 and other than dog and cat food, put up in packings for individual sale CN 2309 10;

category.description: Supply of natural gas

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to supply of natural gas, including fees related to that supply, made until March 31, 2026.

code.description: Fuel wood, in logs, in billets, in twigs, in faggots or in similar forms; wood in chips or particles; sawdust and wood waste and scrap, whether or not agglomerated in logs, briquettes, pellets or similar forms

category.description: Wood used as firewood (until 1 January 2030)

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to supply of firewood, pellets, briquettes and wood chips made until March 31, 2026.
